sentences.english: The design of a new kind of UV or DUV lithography lenses is described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种新的紫外或深紫外光刻物镜。

sentences.english: This is illustrated in Figure 3 using three different magnifications .
sentences.chinese: 图所示为三种不同倍率的物镜下的图形。

sentences.english: Hence the value of high numerical aperture for such specimens.
sentences.chinese: 因此对这标本需采用大数值孔径的物镜。

sentences.english: Optical design of apochromatic objective used wave disparity method in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 采用波差法进行复消色物镜的光学设计。

sentences.english: Measuring results of two microscope objectives were also given .
sentences.chinese: 并给出了对两个显微物镜测量的结果。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the larger the numerical aperture of the objective, the less the effect of the slant angle on the line image shape.
sentences.chinese: 物镜的数值孔径越大，倾角对线结构成像的影响越小。

sentences.english: We consider that the digital image acquired by 20x object lens is suitable to be the virtual slide.
sentences.chinese: 认为20倍物镜采集的数码图像比较适合作虚拟切片。

sentences.english: The focusing characteristics of Gaussian beam through the List microscope objective is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了高斯光束经里斯特显微物镜的聚焦特性。

sentences.english: This objective produces only very little scattered light.
sentences.chinese: 此物镜仅产生很小的散射光。

sentences.english: The circularly polarized light is then focused down onto the disk.
sentences.chinese: 圆偏振光经物镜聚焦后射到光盘上。

sentences.english: Finally the design of a refracting-reflecting objective with long focal length is represented.
sentences.chinese: 最后，介绍了折反射式长焦距物镜的设计。

sentences.english: Objective lens, optical pickup device, recorder and reproducer.
sentences.chinese: 物镜，光学拾取器，记录器和重现设备。

sentences.english: Type D also owns objective magnification and indenter automatic switching devices.
sentences.chinese: 型还拥有测量物镜与压头自动切换装置。
